title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Sljeme, Croatia
content:
Photo submitted by Nevan Boskovic, “Hello from Sljeme, our mountain overlooking the capital city of Croatia – Zagreb, where even during foggy weather the sights are amazing. The bike is a 2020 Santa Cruz Nomad.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Sljeme, Croatia appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
